Extract a strata factor from a survey.design object

Source: R/engines_el_impl_survey.R
el_extract_strata_factor.Rd

Uses the original svydesign() call stored in the object to recreate the stratum labels as a single factor. When multiple stratification variables are supplied, their interaction is used.

Usage

el_extract_strata_factor(design)

Developed by Maciej Beręsewicz, Igor Kołodziej, Mateusz Iwaniuk.

Site built with pkgdown 2.2.0.
